language.adindicator: Your selection will follow this sponsors message in - seconds
language.skipvideo: You can skip to video in
language.fill_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields.
language.email_sent: Thank you! Video has been sent.
language.video_not_allow_embed_player: The requested video does not allow playback in the embedded players.
language.youtube_ID_Invalid: The video ID that does not have 11 characters, or if the video ID contains invalid characters.
language.video_Removed_or_private: The requested video is not found. This occurs when a video has been removed (for any reason), or it has been marked as private.
language.audio_not_found: The requested audio is not found or access denied
language.video_access_denied: The requested video is not found or access denied
language.FileStructureInvalid: Flash Player detects an invalid file structure and will not try to play this type of file. Supported by Flash Player 9 Update 3 and later.
language.NoSupportedTrackFound: Flash Player does not detect any supported tracks (video, audio or data) and will not try to play the file. Supported by Flash Player 9 Update 3 and later.
